import React, { useState } from 'react' const GetStarted = () => { const [name,setName]=useState() const [username,setUsername]=useState() const [password,setPassword]=useState() const emailUpdated = (e) => { setEmail(e.target.value) } const passwordUpdated = (e) => { setPassword(e.target.value) } const nameUpdated=(e)=>{ setName(e.target.value); } return ( <>
SignUp Here!
{ setName=null setPassword=null setUsername=null }} className="btn btn-lg bg-warning" value="Reset" />
) } export default GetStarted
